name: Drum of Endurance
description: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

abilities.name: Endurance
abilities.description: Grants movement and attack speed to all nearby allies for a short while on cast.
notes: Does not place the buff on units that are already affected by Boots of Bearing, and vice versa
Cannot be cast by Meepo clones
Does not interrupt the caster's channeling abilities upon cast
The buff of successive Endurance casts does not stack but refreshes the duration instead
Only affects player-controlled units, including invulnerable units, excluding wards
Does not share cooldowns with Drum of Endurance

abilities.name: Swiftness Aura
abilities.description: Increases the movement speed of nearby allies by a flat amount.
notes: Multiple identical instances of Swiftness Aura do not stack, regardless of source
Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
If a Boots of Bearing was purchased as well, Boots of Bearing's icon takes priority
Drum of Endurance is a permanent item, using up all charges does not make it disappear
The sell value of the item does not depend on the remaining charges
trivia: This item is based on the Ancient Janggo of Endurance from Warcraft 3
In DotA, the item is named Ancient Janggo of Endurance as well

recentChanges.description: Reduced Wind Lace cost from 250 to 225 (total cost decreases from 1650 to 1625). Endurance no longer has 8 charges, increased cooldown from 30 to 45, reduced attack speed bonus from 45 to 35. Reduced Swiftness Aura movement speed bonus from 20 to 15.
Reduced Recipe cost from 550 to 500 (total cost decreases from 1700 to 1650).
Endurance no longer interrupt caster's channeling abilities upon cast. No longer replenish charges upon rebuying the recipe. Now builds into Boots of Bearing.
